SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameSubject
public class Player extends Object implements GameSubject
This class represents a player. A player is an entity that sits to play the game and is characterized by the following attributes:
- is active;
- has a turn assigned in which to play;
- can choose a color;
- is identifier by a unique string named nickname.
